string_table.str: Good work, Boomerang Company. The Captain is going to want to thank you personally when you get back.
Good work, Boomerang Company. We're sending in Hornets for extraction.
The Captain is going to want to thank you personally when you get back.
We're sending in Hornets for extraction.
Perimeter looks clear. Our teams are sweeping for any last Banished stragglers now.
Error. Launch compromised. Huragok, Compensate.
Stop human interference.
As one, end them.
We're definitely getting a reaction.
All I know is that the Sentinels didn't like it!
Second charging column out of action.
Isabel's going to have plenty of Forerunner tech to investigate once we've set up a new research outpost here.
T
I
We got a Hunter!
Good work, Quinn. Now let's scuttle that ship and make sure they can't use it again.
Give me a sec...okay launch stopped.
Looks like the big ones are shielding the, uh, less big one.
It's working, the charging column is shutting down.
We've got to get a Colossus to each of the other charging columns and shut them down.
O
Keep firing!
It's moving, what's happening?
Sentinels are coming in to defend the column!
Spirit of Fire, this is Boomerang Company. Mission successful, over.
I
Good drop, Helljumpers. We did good today. Let's go home.
Roger that, Spirit of Fire. The ship is out of the picture and we're heading back.
Then we're not done yet. The ship should be safe to approach now. Let's get in there and make sure it stays grounded for good.
I don't care how big they are, they're standing between us and the ship!
Focus fire on the Goliaths first, take out the shields!
They just come in all shapes, don't they?
Destroy the explosives cache in the center of the map
Kill enemy units with the Colossus
The Colossus is a powerful new unit, use it to eliminate the enemy.
Use the Colossus to killl Banished or Forerunner enemy units.
Enemy units killed using the Colossus.
Destroy enemy units and buildings with the Colossus Stomp
The Colossus' Stomp ability unleashes a powerful seismic shock which can destroy enemy units and buildings alike.
Use the Colossus special ability to destroy enemy units and buildings.
Enemy units and buildings destroyed by the Colossus Stomp
Destroy the Banished air transports
The Banished are transporting explosives using aerial units. Neutralize them.
Banished spirit gunships are making supply runs between their bases and the forerunner ship. Intercept them along the route.
Banished transport destroyed
Destroy Controller Sentinels
Destroy Controller Sentinels
Destroy Controller Sentinels
Controller Sentinels Destroyed
Disable Controller Sentinel shields
Disable Controller Sentinel shields in order to neutralize the Controller Sentinels.
Disable Controller Sentinel shields
Controller Sentinel shield disabled
Destroy Banished Forerunner ship supplies
The Banished are placing charges and explosives on the Forerunner ship, destroy the ones being loaded to buy some extra time.
The Banished are placing charges and explosives on the Forerunner ship, destroy the ones being loaded to buy some extra time.
Banished Forerunner supplies destroyed
Deactivate a Controller shield without being attacked by any Controller Sentinels
Deactivate a Controller shield without being attacked by any Controller Sentinels. Holo Decoy units can be used as distractions.
Deactivate a Controller's shield without allowing it to attack your units.
Deactivate a Controller shield without being attacked by any Controller Sentinels.
Destroy the explosives cache
Kill Hunter Captain in three minutes
Eliminate the Hunter Captain within three minutes to prove the efficiency of Vaughan's ODST team.
Kill Hunter Captain in three minutes
Kill Hunter Captain in three minutes
Kill Goliaths
Goliaths are dangerous enemies to leave on the battlefield. Eliminate them.
Kill Goliaths
Kill Goliaths
Finish the mission without losing any Colossus units
Colossus units are vital to the mission, complete it without losing a single one of them.
Complete the primary mission objectives without losing any Colossus units in battle.
Colossus lost
The last feeds from our Condors showed several charging columns linked directly to the ship, providing energy for the launch.
V
I
Condors on their way, Vaughan.
We've lost our Condors! There's some kind of mass power flux coming from the ship!
Spirit of Fire, we're clear of the launch site. Send in those Condors to scuttle that ship.
Damnit. Quinn, you're up. But we've got to shut down the power connections to that ship before we approach. We can't go out like those Condors did.
Humans. Desist interference. We will have dominion. You will be undone.
Persist. Divide.
Hold fast. As one, eliminate.
Shield vessel. Finish enemy.
Protect. Harden.
We are one. We endure.
Humans. Final warning. Abstain or be undone.
Humans. Cease. Your actions are hollow. Time expires.
Agitators. Propulsion is imminent. Impediment impossible. Capitulate now.
That's slowed down the launch of the ship and given us more time.
Got eyes on the second charging column! Get a Colossus in there!
Spotted a charging column. Send in a Colossus.
Charging column down.
The final charging column is over here! I need a Colossus.
Area's clear and base is on its way, Vaughan.
There are two potential locations for a base drop, but we've got to move fast, it says the launch sequence has started!
Vaughan, we have eyes on a stack of explosives waiting to be loaded near the Forerunner ship. Seems like a good opportunity to cause some trouble.
Whoa, how many explosives are they planning to pack into that ship?
There you are!
Vaughan, that signal we heard earlier, it's back!
Ugh, I feel like I need to decontaminate my ears. How do those worm things even talk?
How could you even tell from that? The Banished keep delivering ugly surprises. Some days I miss the Covenant.
Colossus en route, stand back!
That Spirit must have been carrying something more volatile than Banished troops!
Talk about overkill. Maybe we could turn the tables?
In all the years we fought the Covenant, I never thought they'd put Hunters in charge.
As long as he's at the top, of course.
Vaughan, we still haven't heard anything from Anders. Maybe we should be capturing this ship rather than scuttling it?
Can't believe the Banished would turn their only chance to get off the Ark into a weapon.
Vaughan, Spirit of Fire is sending a larger force, but it's going to take them some time to mobilize.
It's moving towards the control tower.
Check out the beam, though. It's attached to the nearby power node. If we shut down the node it may weaken the shields.
I'm going to need a long shower after this.
If I never see a worm again...
Vaughan, Forerunner defense systems must have moved the charging device down into the base plate.
We're going to need a pretty large hit to the platform to disable it now.
Vaughan, we have Pelican transports standing by if we need them for the Colossus units.
A direct application of kinetic energy should be applied here.
OK. Shoot it!
All clear.
There's the charging column, send in a Colossus.
Another charging column spotted. Send in a Colossus.
We've found the last charging column.
Keep hitting them. We can't let them restart the launch!
If they want an explosion, let's not keep them waiting.
Something's cloaking the Banished base. We need to get a visual on it.
I don't want to think about it. But that's got to be the 'Colony' the hologram mentioned. And it doesn't sound happy.
Sounds like we've got 'em rattled, though. Let's keep moving.
Get that Colossus to the charging column - and hit it hard.
The Banished are trying to stop us getting to the charging column. Show them what a Colossus can do.
All those explosives headed toward the ship...they've got to be packing them on board before they launch it at the Spirit of Fire.
Agreed. Let's pop those care packages every chance we get.
Charges away. Quinn, drop that ship down, we don't want it surface level when the payload blows.
We're not fighting the Covenant anymore, Quinn. I don't think Atriox shares their ideas of hierarchy.
We can't take that risk. Have faith in the Professor, she'll come through for us.
Atriox doesn't back down from a fight does he? Well, neither do we.
Keep focused, team, the Spirit of Fire is counting on us.
Come on, Helljumpers. If we fail this, the Banished will take out our home. We're not going to let that happen.
That ship isn't going to wait for us, Quinn. We've got to keep moving or the Spirit of Fire will be nothing but wreckage up there.
Controller Sentinel, hang back.
It's on a patrol path, hold back until it's moved on.
Energy shield down. You know the drill, focus fire at the rear!
Those things were deadly enough with half shields, but this one looks invulnerable.
Take out the bigger ones first!
Keep hitting those Goliaths, that Captain's protected by their shields!
Don't let up! We can't scuttle the ship while that thing's in the way!
Both Goliaths are down, the Hunter Captain's vulnerable!
Put 'em in the ground.
You and me both. Let's get some charges on that ship, Helljumpers.
The Banished loaded it with explosives and it would be a shame to let them go to waste!
We won't be able to stop them launching that ship if we can't even get near it. Let's get down there and disable those charging columns.
I know just the thing. We need a Colossus mech on the double.
Contact Spirit of Fire and tell them to standby with a base drop and a Colossus pad.
The new base means we have the capacity for another Colossus pad. Let's make the most of it.
Move it, Helljumpers! We've got to stop that launch.
We've got incoming, Helljumpers. Clear them out!
Area's clear. Quinn, let's get to that terminal and stop the launch.
You know you could just say 'Shoot it'.
Sentinels have powered up one of the charging columns. We're going to have to shut it down again.
They've powered up one of the charging columns, we need to get a Colossus back there.
The Sentinels have restarted one of the charging columns, we'll need to shut it down again.
The Sentinels are trying to restart one of the charging columns.
One of the charging columns is being restarted by Sentinels.
One of the charging columns is being powered back up by the Sentinels.
The Sentinels are restoring power to one of the charging columns.
Sentinels are powering up one of the charging columns.
The Banished aren't trying to contact reinforcements, they're using the ship as a weapon. A direct hit from that would destroy the Spirit of Fire!
Alert the captain, but we have to stop this, now. First up, we've got to disable those charging columns.
We're getting there, team. Keep up the pace.
We're looking good, keep going.
If we keep this up, we may just make it in time.
Plenty of time on the clock, team. Stay focused.
We've got to step up the pace, it's getting close to launch.
Pick it up, Helljumpers, we don't have time to waste.
That ship's close to launching, we've got to move faster.
Let's pick up the pace while we still have time.
If we don't move faster, that ship's going to tear the Spirit of Fire apart!
We're too close to launch, move! Move!
We're nearly out of time, move now!
Disable all charging columns
Overload the ship at the terminal
Activate the terminal
Activate the terminal to halt the launch sequence.
The terminal will shut down the forerunner structures in the area.
Terminal deactivated
Choose a base location to call in a Colossus pad.
Pick a base location from one of the two marked building slots so you can build a Colossus pad.
Pick a base location from one of the two marked building slots so you can build a Colossus pad.
Possible Base Location
Base Location Chosen
Call in a Colossus Drop
Call in a Colossus Drop from the Spirit of Fire.
Use the Landing Pad to build a Colossus unit.
Colossus unit built
Prevent the Forerunner Ship from launching
If the Forerunner ship is launched, it will destroy the Spirit of Fire.
The Banished are attempting to launch a Forerunner ship and use it as a missile by sending it on a collision course with the Spirit of Fire.
Forerunner Ship launch prevented
Repel the counter-attack
Repel the counter-attack to clear the area and safely scuttle the launch.
The Banished have sent a large counter-attack in an attempt to retake the forerunner installation.
Beaten counter-attack
Kill the Hunter Captain
The Hunter Captain must be neutralized before the ship can be scuttled.
Shoot
Get to the launch platform and scuttle the Forerunner ship
Secure the charging column
Secure the charging column area to safely stop the launch.
Kill the Banished guards to secure the column.
Column secured
Clear the launch area of Banished
Colony is determined to hold that launch area. Clear the launch area of the Banished.
Clear the launch area.
Launch area cleared
Shoot the column
The column could be disabled by firepower. Target and shoot it.
The column could be disabled by firepower. Target and shoot it.
Column shot at
Disable charging columns
All charging columns must be disabled to access the launching site.
Prevent the completion and launch of the Forerunner ship by disabling the charging columns that are preventing access to the launch controls.
Columns deactivated
Disable the column with the Colossus
Use the Colossus to deliver a seismic shock to disable the column.
Shooting the column disrupted it, but a large enough shock delivered by something big enough may disable it permanently.
Column successfully stomped
Your Colossus is ready for duty. It's a heavy vehicle that is useful in a "tank" role, attracting enemy attention towards itself to protect other ally units.
Colossus Landing Pad
Highlight the Colossus in the radial menu using the @TutScrollCam@ and press @TutSelect@ to train
Select the Colossus Pad to open the Colossus Pad command menu.
COLOSSUS
Use the Colossus' Stomp ability by pressing @special_power@ over the column's base
Hunter Captain
Forerunner Ship launches in
Capture towers tethered to Controller Sentinels to deactivate their rear shields, leaving them vulnerable to attack from behind.
Colossus units are now available to call in at all your bases.
Cloaked units and buildings cannot be attacked until they are detected. Wolverines, Snipers, Nightingales and full upgraded Jackrabbits have detection abilities.
Each new base built will add a Colossus pad and increase your population cap.
The Pelican Transport leader power can be used to quickly move units across the map.
